scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of records of the United Office and Professional Workers of America, CIO. Included are materials from Lewis Merrill, President of the United office and Professional Workers of America. Includes the pamphlet "The Organization of a single establishment : an approach" by Lewis Merrill.
